author: cms-sw
body:
The changes in `process_pr.py` are - for the most part - wrapping actions to log them. 

Tests are in `tests/test_process_pr.py`, I modified existing tests to run under `pytest` as well. Code in `tests/Framework.py` was borrowed from [`pygithub`](https://github.com/PyGithub/PyGithub/blob/main/tests/Framework.py), with a few modifications.

Each test uses information from `ReplayData/TestProcessPr.<testname>.txt` to fake (replay) requests to GitHub API, and bot actions are compared with "true" ones in `PRActionData/TestProcessPr.<testname>.json`.
